item.title: The new way to patch the vCenter Server Appliance 6
item.description: The patching process in vCenter Server Appliance (vCSA) version 6 is changed from previous versions. It is not possible anymore to use the Virtual Appliance Management Interface (VAMI) and update the appliance using the User Interface. The new way to patch the vCenter Server Appliance involves the following steps: Download the patch from the VMware Patch Download Center, link . Choose vc and select version 6.x Download the latest patch ISO Attach the *.
